control.label: [COLOR $INFO[Window(1100).Property(description_info_color)]]VOD[/COLOR][CR][CR]Scroll through your TV, Movie, Music, PVR and addons librarary.[CR][CR]YOU MUST HAVE MEDIA ADDED TO YOUR LIBRARY TO ENJOY THIS FEATURE[CR]
[COLOR $INFO[Window(1100).Property(description_info_color)]]Choose[/COLOR][CR][CR]Choose or remove a stream from the channel database.

[COLOR $INFO[Window(1100).Property(description_info_color)]]Add Alt Stream[/COLOR][CR][CR]Set a second stream to the database. Alt streams can also act as a fallback if your main channel fails. To remove alt streams go to streamsetup tab.

[COLOR $INFO[Window(1100).Property(description_info_color)]]Catchup Addon[/COLOR][CR][CR]Set an addon via settings that has catchup capability to go back in time and view pre aired programs without commercials.
[COLOR $INFO[Window(1100).Property(description_info_color)]]Catchup Meta[/COLOR][CR][CR]Use a meta addon to go back in time and view pre aired programs without commercials.

[COLOR $INFO[Window(1100).Property(description_info_color)]]Remind[/COLOR][CR][CR]Set a reminder for an upcoming program. Alternatly you can use Autoplay to automatically turn to the program when it starts, or Autoplaywith to use a 3rd party player.
[COLOR $INFO[Window(1100).Property(description_info_color)]]Lists[/COLOR][CR][CR]Use these lists to browse the EPG for specific content.
[COLOR $INFO[Window(1100).Property(description_info_color)]]Stream Setup[/COLOR][CR][CR]Here you can set specific channels to the database from addons you choose, PVR, m3u files, or favourites.

[COLOR $INFO[Window(1100).Property(description_info_color)]]Refresh ini[/COLOR][CR][CR]Refresh the addons.ini subscriptions you select inside stream setup. You should run this occasionnally to stay current with the addons respective channel playlist.
[COLOR $INFO[Window(1100).Property(description_info_color)]]Settings[/COLOR][CR][CR]Enter the core addon settings or change the EPG skins layout.
[COLOR $INFO[Window(1100).Property(description_info_color)]]Quit[/COLOR][CR][CR]This skin is not officially endorsed by Kodi, but i officially endorse Kodi.[CR][CR]Cake Skin[CR][CR]Andy
